  Summary 

public class  IntVector
     extends java.util.Vector
{
          // Constructors 1
     public IntVector(int);

          // Methods 3
     public void append(int);
     public int get(int);
     public void set(int, int);
}

An IntVector is a vector whose elements are of type int. Since these elements have to be converted to an Object of type Integer, some methods which do the type conversion are supplied.
